chapter.title: Installation of Virtualization Components
chapter.para: None of the virtualization tools is installed by default.

sect1.title: Installing &kvm;
sect1.para: To install &kvm; and KVM tools, proceed as follows:

step.para: Start &yast; and choose Virtualization Installing Hypervisor and Tools.
Select &kvm; server for a minimal installation of &qemu; tools. Select &kvm; tools if a &libvirt;-based management stack is also desired. Confirm with Accept.

To enable normal networking for the &vmguest;, using a network bridge is recommended. &yast; offers to automatically configure a bridge on the &vmhost;. Agree to do so by choosing Yes, otherwise choose No.
After the setup has been finished, you can start setting up &vmguest;s. Rebooting the &vmhost; is not required.

sect1.title: Installing &xen;
sect1.para: To install &xen; and &xen; tools, proceed as follows:

step.para: Start &yast; and choose Virtualization Installing Hypervisor and Tools.
Select &xen; server for a minimal installation of &xen; tools. Select &xen; tools if a &libvirt;-based management stack is also desired. Confirm with Accept.

To enable normal networking for the &vmguest;, using a network bridge is recommended. &yast; offers to automatically configure a bridge on the &vmhost;. Agree to do so by choosing Yes, otherwise choose No.
After the setup has been finished, you need to reboot the machine with the &xen; kernel.

sect1.title: Installing Containers
sect1.para: To install containers, proceed as follows:

step.para: Start &yast; and choose Virtualization Installing Hypervisor and Tools.
Select libvirt lxc daemon and confirm with Accept.

sect1.title: Patterns
sect1.para: It is possible using Zypper and patterns to install virtualization packages. Run the command zypper in -t pattern PATTERN. Available patterns are:

listitem.para: kvm_server: sets up the &kvm; &vmhost; with &qemu; tools for management
kvm_tools: installs the &libvirt; tools for managing and monitoring &vmguest;s
xen_server: sets up the &xen; &vmhost; with &xen; tools for management
xen_tools: installs the libvirt tools for managing and monitoring &vmguest;s
There is no pattern for containers; install the libvirt-daemon-lxc package.
